subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Mark Martin, who drove his first race in the series in 1981, has had a remarkable season, which he has said will be his last in the Nextel Cup Series.
snippet: Mark Martin, who drove his first race in the series in 1981, has had a remarkable season, which he has said will be his last in the Nextel Cup Series.
